trends: There have been no other sightings in Hampton
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: i saw 25-30 orange fireballs movbing slowly in a procession from west to east.
divs: sighting detailsat 10.00 pm i went outside and immediatly noticed about six slow moving orange ,silent orbs\fireballs moving in a line from west to east ,horizion to horizion,i went inside to get a camera and had my wife ,niece ,and grandad come out side ,and for the next 20 minutes we saw at least 15-20 more of them following the same path spread unevenly an some were a degree or two to one side,as we were watching my daughter and sister returned from shopping and said they had also witnessed the event by vehicle . everyone agreed it was unlike anything they had ever seen before. i did manage to get one decent still of one fireball on my wifes phone and will upload later today
